hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: I do some voluntary work medcenter-canada.com So perhaps, even with all his defence of insurance businesses, Hirai is after all looking at a slightly more focused Sony? “There’s a lot of discussion that goes on looking at the portfolio of products that we have and the portfolio of businesses that we’re in. And we have to make those decisions accordingly based on where we see things as it stands right now and what the potential for their contribution going forward is, and the requirement to keep those businesses going.”
